modName: Lower Training Costs and train 10 times per level
summary: Lowers the training cost for skill trainers and allows you to train 10 times per level.
descriptionHtml:
Lowers the training costs for all trainers (half you skill and 10x)

Let me know of any glitches or trainers that I\'ve missed and I\'ll get to fixing it.

Feedback, Rate, Leave Suggestions and check out my other mods :)

Update: Fixed a few of the trainers not following the half skill X 10 rule.
All trainers should have the same cost (even if they\'re a master trainer)
Master trainers can now train you to 95 for a skill instead of just 90
author: Windrider494

files.name: Lower Training Cost and Train 10 times
files.fileName: Lower Training Cost and Train 10 times-10804-1-0-1.rar
